COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: [Chris] “Are you really okay with not going to school
today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: [Phorni] “Do I have to keep repeating myself? Today's
the day Ms. Cordell introduces your partner to you, so
there's no reason for me to go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... That's a shame.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188
STRING: [Phorni] “And why would you think that, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e
STRING: [Chris] “Well, because we've spent so much time
together lately.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, you can come by whenever you're free.
As long as you're quiet, like you are during Ms. Cordell's
lessons, it should be fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224
STRING: [Phorni] “...In that case, I'll hitch a ride with you some
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, just say the word.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, have a nice day!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26e
STRING: [Chris] “See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6
STRING: It'd been a while since I walked to school by myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2
STRING: Phorni weighed nothing, so it wasn't like my shoulder
felt lighter or anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: But the tickling sensation around my neck, the constant
humming at my ear...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: Until yesterday, I'd found them a little annoying, but I
really missed them now, and even felt sad that they'd
be gone from my life.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: When I went out to buy things, or to pick up the mail.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: It didn't matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c
STRING: I wanted to be with Phorni as much as possible, in the
time we had left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x362
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x378
STRING: I opened the classroom door and went in, but Ms.
Cordell hadn't come in yet, apparently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: Whatever happened today, I ought to be prepared.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a4
STRING: I removed my Fortelle from its case and put it in its
usual place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ba
STRING: The way I imagined it, my partner-to-be would either
come in with Ms. Cordell, or be called in after a short
introduction, like a transfer student.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: I wondered about this person with whom I'd have to
spend quite some time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: To avoid trouble, I'd have preferred someone who didn't
talk much, but there was no way I could've set
conditions like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: I was depending entirely on Ms. Cordell, so whatever
the result, I had no regrets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: That was the result of putting my time with Phorni first.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x466
STRING: [Cordell] “Morning, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47c
STRING: [Chris] “Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x492
STRING: Ms. Cordell entered the classroom alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x49e
STRING: Transfer student style, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b2
STRING: [Cordell] “Now then, this is the last lesson of the year...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c8
STRING: [Chris] “Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fa
STRING: [Cordell] “And it doesn't seem like you need my
assistance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x510
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52e
STRING: [Cordell] “You've been practicing a lot lately; I'm
relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x544
STRING: She sounded happy, almost.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: I had no idea what she was getting at.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55c
STRING: [Chris] “...What is this about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58e
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm? Oh, I've just heard reports that you've
been practicing every day with a very skilled singer...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ae
STRING: [Chris] “'Reports'... You say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5cc
STRING: [Cordell] “I have my own ways of showing concern for
students under my care. That's what I've heard... Am I
mistaken?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ec
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60a
STRING: [Cordell] “You've been practicing, but you haven't made
the decision yet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x620
STRING: ... Who was she talking about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x62c
STRING: The only person I'd been practicing with was Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x638
STRING: [Chris] “Who told you about all this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x656
STRING: [Cordell] “That is irrelevant. I'd like an answer to my
question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x676
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh, I haven't decided yet, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: [Cordell] “But what? If you intend to pair up with this
person, you should do so, fast.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c8
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, I know, but... When did you hear about all
this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x704
STRING: [Cordell] “...Three days ago. Does that matter?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71a
STRING: Which meant... I could only think of my ensembles with
Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x738
STRING: [Cordell] “The song you've been practicing, it's for that
purpose, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x758
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76e
STRING: Did someone hear me talking to Phorni?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77a
STRING: That was...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x786
STRING: What should I make of all this?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x792
STRING: I wasn't worried at all about being found out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a8
STRING: In fact... I even found it somewhat amazing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7be
STRING: If someone else was able to hear her sing...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ca
STRING: What would they think?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: And how would Phorni feel?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ea
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x800
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x81e
STRING: [Cordell] “You're interested in pairing up, but she isn't, is
that the situation?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x83e
STRING: [Chris] “...There's some of that, you might say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85c
STRING: [Cordell] “The voice student I'd prepared for you, she
declined too, for similar reasons. I'd have to ask her
again, I suppose.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x886
STRING: [Chris] “Ah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a8
STRING: Suddenly, I had the dream-like, ridiculous thought of
performing with Phorni at the graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8be
STRING: If Phorni's voice could reach someone else in the form of
music, that'd be amazing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: ... Even if I left this city, that person would be able to
hear her sing, and keep her company.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f4
STRING: Of course, I planned on asking her to come with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: But if Phorni wasn't interested, I couldn't force her to
leave the city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x916
STRING: That's why I had to consider this possibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x92c
STRING: Until now, no one else had been able to hear Phorni's
voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x938
STRING: Her ensembles with me had to be the key.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94e
STRING: ... What I was about to say was really stupid.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x964
STRING: But I just couldn't stop myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x970
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... That won't be necessary.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: [Cordell] “Sure? Okay. For third year students, the final
deadline is the fourth day of the New Year.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9de
STRING: [Cordell] “Although anyone slightly more interested in
school life than you, Chris, would probably know that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1a
STRING: [Cordell] “For first and second years, or... Well, I can't
imagine it, but if it's someone not from this school, she
can just show up on the day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa42
STRING: [Cordell] “Only the names of the Fortelle players will be
included in the program, anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa62
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa80
STRING: [Cordell] “...Any questions?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa96
STRING: [Chris] “I have a few...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac8
STRING: [Cordell] “But you don't need to ask? That's fine. By the
sound of your Fortelle playing lately, you don't have
much to worry about.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf2
STRING: I trust you, was what Ms. Cordell was saying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb08
STRING: Had my sound really changed that much?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb14
STRING: To the point where a student like me could be trusted
by my teacher?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb20
STRING: If that were true, it was all thanks to Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2c
STRING: [Chris] “...Just in case, could you let me give you an
update on the 4th?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb68
STRING: [Cordell] “The student I have in mind is a third year...
Oh, whatever. She won't say no. If it came to that, you'll
have to play her song, due to time constraints.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb92
STRING: [Chris] “I'm okay with that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb0
STRING: [Cordell] “You're a quick learner, so I'm sure it'd all
come together in time for the recital. With maximum
effort, you might even scrape by and graduate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbda
STRING: [Chris] “...I wouldn't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0c
STRING: [Cordell] “Your potential partner, who is she? I can't
think of anyone that you'd be so obsessed with.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2c
STRING: [Chris] “Does it look like I'm obsessed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5e
STRING: [Cordell] “Would you be cutting things this close
otherwise? But I know how you're feeling. It's obvious
from the sound of your playing every day.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc88
STRING: [Chris] “I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: [Cordell] “As I expected. That's fine. Make sure you
convince her in time for the recital. Ah, what fun. Now
then, time for practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce4
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd36
STRING: Ms. Cordell was in a good mood the whole lesson.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd42
STRING: I was in two minds about the possibility of someone
else hearing Phorni's voice, and to add to that, I was
confused by Ms. Cordell's cheerfulness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd62
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6e
STRING: Hearing that from someone who rarely gave praise
made me think that I was changing for the better, at
least.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd84
STRING: These weren't the kind of things you could notice about
yourself, so I had nearly zero self-awareness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9a
STRING: So I had no choice but to trust her words, and if I
trusted them completely, then I knew that I wasn't
doing the wrong thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdba
STRING: Should I tell Phorni right away?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc6
STRING: Or would it be better to wait until Natale?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd2
STRING: I knew there'd be a fairly high chance of being scolded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde8
STRING: If no one else could hear her, then I couldn't graduate,
of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: But I didn't care at all, that's how enchanted I was by
her singing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe14
STRING: If I couldn't graduate, I'd just return to my hometown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: I couldn't make Arie wait any more, and I no longer had
any desire to make it in the world of music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: I'd even feel thankful that I could return to the
fundamentals of simply enjoying sound.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: I could see such a future in store for me, that's how
much I cared about Phorni now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe62
STRING: Anyway, it all hinged on how I was going to talk Phorni
into doing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: I had until tomorrow to come up with the words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: I headed to the cafeteria deep in thought, where Torta
was already seated at her usual place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec2
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef4
STRING: [Torta] “Morning... So, how was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0a
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean, how was what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: [Torta] “What did Ms. Cordell say to you? About a
partner, practice...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf48
STRING: [Chris] “‘Convince her,’ is what she said.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: [Torta] “...Ugh, how gauche. So it's a girl? ... The same
one you mentioned on Tuesday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9a
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, that's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb0
STRING: I couldn't say she was a fairy, could I?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfbc
STRING: And besides, Torta would be the first one to explode if
the truth came out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd2
STRING: Asino would probably say “How poetic,” and laugh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe8
STRING: One way or another, everyone would make fun of me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffc
STRING: [Torta] “I see... Well, keep it up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1012
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, I'll try.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1044
STRING: [Torta] “The time for trying is long gone. Are you going
to practice after this?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1078
STRING: [Chris] “No, my partner isn't here today, so I'm going
home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: If I tell Phorni something similar, she'll indulge me for
today, at least.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ac
STRING: [Torta] “I see. I'm leaving too... Oh, just one more thing.
Check your mail when you get home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10cc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ea
STRING: [Torta] “...You only bother to check on Sundays, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110a
STRING: [Chris] “That may be so, but what am I looking for,
some kind of notice from the school?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1132
STRING: [Torta] “You'll see. Well, I'm off to practice. The practice
rooms must be packed, last day of school and all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115c
STRING: Without waiting for my reply, Torta stood up and
stuffed the last of her sandwich into her mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Chris] “...No talking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a4
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c8
STRING: Torta nodded several times, and then walked outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d4
STRING: I watched her go as I prepared a drink in one hand,
then I went back home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121e
STRING: As Torta instructed, I looked into the mailbox and saw a
familiar envelope.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: I knew right away that it was a letter from Arie, but I
had no clue what it contained.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126e
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh? Aren't you a little early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1284
STRING: [Chris] “My partner-to-be couldn't make it today, so
there wasn't any practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c0
STRING: [Phorni] “I see. Well, welcome home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d6
STRING: I dried my hair with a towel and went inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? What's that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1314
STRING: [Chris] “A letter from Arie... I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? But today's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1348
STRING: [Chris] “Mm hmm. That's why I'm a little concerned.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x135e
STRING: I put my stuff down and opened the letter at once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136a
STRING: There was just one sheet of paper inside, as usual.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: Dear Chris, sorry for the sudden letter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13d6
STRING: In my last letter, I said that we'd be meeting on Natale,
but I'm sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f4
STRING: I just can't take time off from work, so I won't be able to
go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1412
STRING: You must be busy preparing for your graduation recital,
Chris. I'm busy too, working at the bakery.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1430
STRING: And recently, I was asked to oversee the whole process,
from start to end, as well as train the new guys.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144e
STRING: I should've been able to get time off before Natale, but
those tasks have made it impossible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146e
STRING: I really didn't want to write a letter like this, but you'd
get worried if I didn't, so here it is.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1496
STRING: I knew you'd be busy with the graduation recital, but I
never thought I'd be the one saying this...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14be
STRING: I'm truly sorry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d4
STRING: But I'll be working hard here in this city, and you'll work
hard for the graduation recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f2
STRING: Our paths may differ, but our hearts beat as one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1506
STRING: P.S.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x151c
STRING: You'll have a partner by the time this letter gets to you,
right?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153a
STRING: I heard you're not practicing with Torta, so it's someone
else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1558
STRING: Probably a girl, is what Torta said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x156c
STRING: That worried me a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1580
STRING: Whoever it is, let Torta know, okay?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: She's always worrying about you, that Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b2
STRING: Love, Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: [Phorni] “What did Arie say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x161a
STRING: [Chris] “She can't come for this year's Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164c
STRING: [Phorni] “Huh? Why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1662
STRING: [Chris] “She's busy with the bakery.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168c
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a2
STRING: Phorni looked down, deep in thought, and didn't say
anything for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b8
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ea
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1714
STRING: She responded right away, as if to show that nothing
was the matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172a
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it can't be helped. Anyway, I'll be seeing
Arie soon after I graduate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1766
STRING: [Phorni] “...That's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm not that bothered by it, so don't worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, that's good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ce
STRING: [Chris] “Now then. After I'm done writing my reply, shall
we perform for a little while?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17f6
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you going to say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180c
STRING: [Chris] “It's a shame that we can't meet, but our hearts
beat as one.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183e
STRING: [Phorni] “Aaa... What a corny line.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1854
STRING: [Chris] “Arie wrote it first. Don't knock it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1872
STRING: [Phorni] “Sure, sure. If someone said it to me in person,
I'd probably blush.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1888
STRING: [Chris] “You don't blush, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ba
STRING: [Phorni] “Ha-ha, that's true... Oh, by the way, how's your
partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18da
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Right. Can it wait until after Natale?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190c
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1922
STRING: [Chris] “...I might be able to introduce her, and it'll be
more interesting this way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: The real reason was because I'd get scolded if I told the
truth there and then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194e
STRING: I'd definitely get scolded if it were after Natale, but
perhaps Phorni would change her mind, just a little, if
we had the best performance ever on Natale.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198a
STRING: [Phorni] “What, do you know this person?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a0
STRING: [Chris] “It's a secret.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19d2
STRING: [Phorni] “Grr...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e8
STRING: [Chris] “You'll know on the night of Natale.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1a
STRING: [Phorni] “For real...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a30
STRING: [Chris] “For real.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a62
STRING: [Phorni] “Mmm... I guess that's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a78
STRING: ...Yet more reasons to get scolded, they were really
adding up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a84
STRING: But all would become clear the day after tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a90
STRING: [Chris] “That's how it is. Now, shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac2
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae6
STRING: Hearing the joy in Phorni's voice, I felt a little guilty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1afc
STRING: But the thought of Phorni being all alone after I left was
much worse.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b12
STRING: Was I simply running away from having to deal with the
graduation recital?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b28
STRING: I couldn't deny it outright... Which was a little hard to
swallow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b34
STRING: Even if I failed the graduation recital, I'd just go back
home and I wouldn't have to endure another year of not
seeing Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b54
STRING: Of course, that would just inconvenience everybody,
and should be avoided at all costs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6a
STRING: Even so... Why did that thought lead me to feel that
graduation didn't matter at all?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba6
STRING: [Phorni] “What's the matter? Come on, get ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bbc
STRING: [Chris] “Right. Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd2
STRING: Doing as Phorni told me, I quickly set up my Fortelle,
and our practice for the day began.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be8
STRING: Our ensemble, which I'd thought would end tomorrow,
might just go on for a while longer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfe
STRING: I really didn't know if Phorni would allow it to.
